port.title: Port
port.description: [Optional] Port for bulbs to connect to your server.

enableScenes.title: Enable Scenes
enableScenes.description: [Optional] Turn on support for scenes with your lightbulbs. THIS WILL MAKE IT IMPOSSIBLE TO GROUP LIGHTS

lastStatus.title: Last Status
lastStatus.description: [Optional] Lights will remember the last mode used when turned on (light settings in HomeKit will be ignored).

broadcast.title: Broadcast Address
broadcast.description: [Optional] UDP Broadcast address for bulb discovery.

refreshInterval.title: Refresh Pings
refreshInterval.description: [Optional] Refresh/ping every accessory to get their latest state on an interval. Specify in seconds, 0 = off

devices.title: Devices
devices.description: [Optional] Manual list of IP addresses of bulbs
